item.title: Dropbox Valuation - Quick N' Clean
item.description: Dropbox Valuation - Quick N’ Clean Click any link in the list below to jump to topic What is Dropbox What Sets Dropbox Apart Digging into the financials Relative & Intrinsic Valuations Is Dropbox Really a Buy Dropbox’s shares have fallen -27.6% from its July high of $26.20, which was under the recent February high of $26.49 as of 09/06/2019. It’s also -56.4% under the ATH of $43.
